item.title: How the Diamond Sports Group bankruptcy can benefit MLB fans nationwide
item.description: On March 14, 2023, the Diamond Sports Group filed for Bankruptcy. While this seems inconsequential for the average MLB, it actually has massive ramifications. Diamond Sports Group owns the 20+ Bally Sports regional networks, which broadcast regional MLB games. What does this mean for an MLB fan? This isn’t great if you have access to a Bally Sports network. In all likelihood, the MLB will attempt to clarify their streaming rules with this bankruptcy.
